name: T.A.A.V.S.
description:
My entry for Bolt Jam #5!

Be a cybernetic warrior and protect your OS from evil malwares and the unforgiving FATAL ERROR with this truly accurate retro style simulator!

Left Mouse Button: Shoot

Made with Unity (Bolt, Text Mesh Pro). All assets created from scratch except these three:

- Font (https://www.fontspace.com/lcd-solid/lcd-solid)

- Music (https://opengameart.org/content/retro)

- Cursor (https://www.vecteezy.com/vector-art/104990-mouse-clicker-icons-free-vector)

PS: Blue is good, red is bad!

PPS: Insanely immersive if played at fullscreen in a dark room!
